|area_code = 605 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 46-32700 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1267441 |website = |footnotes = }} Jefferson is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Union County, and 475 people lived there at the 2020 census. Jefferson became a city in 1895. ==References== Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1895 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in South Dakota
